name: Ch17bAchievement_Tracker
_source: if;(unit.team not in ['player','other'] and (unit2.nid == 'Moulder' or unit2.nid == 'Tana' or unit2.nid == 'Syrene' or unit2.nid == 'Innes' or unit2.nid == 'Vanessa' or unit2.nid == 'Gilliam')) or (unit2.team not in ['player','other'] and (unit.nid == 'Moulder' or unit.nid == 'Tana' or unit.nid == 'Syrene' or unit.nid == 'Innes' or unit.nid == 'Vanessa' or unit.nid == 'Gilliam'))
